user.title: Cable Modem Monitor Setup
user.description: Enter your cable modem's IP address and credentials. The IP is typically 192.168.100.1 for Motorola modems. Leave username/password blank if your modem doesn't require authentication.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the modem. Please verify: 1) IP address is correct (typically 192.168.100.1), 2) If modem requires authentication, username/password are correct (leave blank if no auth needed), 3) Modem's web interface is accessible from Home Assistant's network. If connection works but setup still fails, your modem model may not be supported yet - please enable debug logging to help us add support.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check Home Assistant logs for details.

connection_settings.title: Cable Modem Settings

data.password: Password (optional, leave blank to keep existing)

data_description.scan_interval: How often to check modem status (60-1800 seconds). Recommended: 300 (5 minutes) to avoid overloading the modem. Lower values may cause device strain.
data_description.history_days: Number of days to keep when clearing history (1-365)

entity_naming.title: Entity Naming Preferences
entity_naming.description: Configure how entity names are formatted. This helps when you have multiple modems or want consistent naming across your Home Assistant setup.

data_description.entity_prefix:
Choose how entity names should be prefixed:
• Default: No prefix (e.g., 'Modem Connection Status')
• Domain: Add 'Cable Modem' prefix (e.g., 'Cable Modem Modem Connection Status')
• IP Address: Use IP as prefix (e.g., '192_168_100_1 Modem Connection Status')
• Custom: Define your own prefix
data_description.custom_prefix: Enter a custom prefix for entity names (only used if Custom is selected above). Example: 'Living Room' will create entities like 'Living Room Modem Connection Status'

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect with the new settings. Please verify the information.

clear_history.name: Clear History
clear_history.description: Clear historical data for cable modem sensors older than a specified number of days

days_to_keep.name: Days to Keep
days_to_keep.description: Number of days of history to keep (older data will be deleted)
